website_summaries.verdict: A stain remover with a wide range of uses even beyond clothes.
pros: Can be used as a pre-treater for tough stains and in your regular washing machine (including high-efficiency machines)
Can also be used to clean carpets, floors, and other hard surfaces
cons: Some buyers said this fades colors in clothing

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe delivery / broken
customer_reviews.text: Package completely open and the stain remover powder spilled everywhere! Got all over me and now my skin is breaking out in a rash!!! Not a safe item to arrive broken!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A quality product for removing stain and keeping whites white
customer_reviews.text: I'd hate to be without Oxiclean stain remover, the reason I ordered a large container of it during lockdown in the facility where I live. It was delivered promptly so when my dwindling supply is gone, I'll be set to go.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise V.

customer_reviews.title: Mess
customer_reviews.text: Top came off in shipping and detergent all over when opening the box. A mess! 😬 lost some of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good clean fun
customer_reviews.text: I love oxi clean, always gets the musty smell out of clothes if they sat in the washer to long.
customer_reviews.author: Janina

customer_reviews.title: of course oxi clean is fabulous. this one arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: of course oxi clean is fabulous. this one arrived with a broken lid, but none of it poured out so its ok
customer_reviews.author: Diane Y. Chapelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I used this stuff last night to soak out some serious stains that have been in my clothes for years and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Flubadub

customer_reviews.title: Always good to have in your laundry supplies
customer_reviews.text: Great stain remover. Tough stains need to soak longer, but it works on most of them.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: L@@k! the OxiClean stain fighter!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OxiClean Stain fighter, just add every load to washer to get tough stains, You can clean anywhere!!!!!! You added! Stains everywhere!!!!!!||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||
customer_reviews.author: Sonicx

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in every wash and don't have trouble getting just about any stain gone. It is not hard on my clothes either like other stain removers.
customer_reviews.author: docnbox

customer_reviews.title: This has been used!
customer_reviews.text: It looked like they sent me a used item. The box said the content is 3 lbs. I doubted it by the look of the content in the box. So I weighted it and it was only 2lbs 4oz. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two products delivered, both were unsealed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product and it was almost completely empty when delivered because it was broken open and had dumped out and fallen through the bottom of the box. Ordered a replacement, which was also delivered unsealed and was only half full. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LPH

customer_reviews.title: RATING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT. IF I HAVE WHITE ANKLETS THAT ARE SOILED, I SOAK THEM IN SMALL AMOUNT OF WATER WITH A SCOOP OF OXI CLEAN (IN MY WASHING MACHINE) AND THEY WILL COME OUT REALLY WHITE. SOMETIMES I LET THEM SOAK FOR HALF AN HOUR.
customer_reviews.author: Joye Engstrom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results, quality product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, well worth the money, cleans clothes and leave them smelling so fresh! I have stains on many items and when I add this along with my laundry soap I have nothing but excellent results
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good. Clothes seem a lot brighter using this product
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I have two Little Leaguers who both had white Baseball uniforms. In addition to Tide with Bleach adding the Oxi-Clean powder made everything the whitest it has ever been. White hats, pants and shirts all were brilliantly white after using the OxiClean powder. Even everything else in the laundry looked great. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Wookiee Warlord

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Really great to get your white clothes white and it takes out stains great. Received it promptly and will buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: HOLLY GOSCHKA

customer_reviews.title: Same good product, much better packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Much better packaging than a cardboard box! Much easier to use!
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar's Mom

product_meta.title: OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover Powder, 3 lbs.
product_meta.description: OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover Powder harnesses the power of oxygen to get out tough dirt, persistent spots and set-in stains. It’s the answer to almost every stain-fighting need you have. When used as directed, the oxygen-based, water-activated formula safely gets dirt and grime out of clothes. Presoak your laundry to loosen and eradicate stains. In the washer, OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover works with your regular detergent to get your clothes extra clean – just pour it into the drum. It comes in handy for carpets, upholstery and nearly any surface in your home. It’s chlorine-free and color safe. Includes one 3 lb. box of OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover Powder. OxiClean offers a wide array of products to fit all your stain removal needs. The OxiClean family has grown to include stain removers, pretreaters, laundry detergent, and much more!
feature_bullets: One 3 lb. box of OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover Powder
Oxygen-based, water-activated formula gets out tough dirt, persistent spots and set-in stains
Works with regular detergent to get clothes extra clean
Works on carpets, upholstery and nearly any surface in your home
